info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 06 at 1:57PM PST until January 07 at 7:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 7 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Areas of northwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 50 mph expected. Localized gusts to 60 mph possible in elevated foothill communities such as the San Gabriel mountain foothills from Altadena to Glendora and below the Santa Monica Mountains from Hollywood Hills to the hills above Santa Monica. * WHERE...Portions of southwest California. * WHEN...From 7 PM this evening to 7 PM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for drivers of high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
